So it's been a while since we've released any specials on here so I figured what better way to announce our new KVM Storage plans than to make them better?

Our entry plan is as follows:  
**KVM Virtualization  
512MB of RAM  
250GB RAID50 Storage  
10TB of Bandwidth  
1Gbps Port  
2 CPU Cores  
1 Dedicated IPv4 Address  
1 /64 IPv6 Block  
Hosted in Tampa, Florida  
Managed via our custom Wyvern Control Panel! (_It'll be getting a face lift soon, I promise!_)  
$5.99 Per Month**  

[You won't find this listed on our site yet so check out the plans here.](https://securedragon.net/clients/cart.php?gid=49)

Order any of our plans (even the one that already comes with 12GB of RAM) and include "**NEED MORE RAM!**" in the order notes and we'll double your RAM for you. This special will run until we list the plan on our website so it's a limited time only offer. :)

_Please note that all of our KVM plans require manual activation which can take up to 24 hours._
